title: How Will Stan Van Gundy Fit With the Pelicans? Plus: NBA Mailbag | The Mismatch
description:
Verno and KOC are back analyzing the Stan Van Gundy hire in New Orleans (1:20) and answering your mailbag questions about the draft, offseason team building, card collecting, and more (9:45).

Hosts: Chris Vernon and Kevin O’Connor
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
